settings.title: 24H Vol (PAXG)
settings.value:
var paxgVol = parseFloat(datasources["itbit-api-paxgusd"]["volume24h"])

return paxgVol

settings.value:
var vol = datasources["ftx-paxg-api"]["paxg_usd"]["volumeUsd24h"]
return parseFloat(vol).toFixed(2).replace(/\d(?=(\d{3})+\.)/g, '$&,')
